mapper.select: SELECT DREAM_REVIEW.*, "SHOP".SHOP_NAME FROM DREAM_REVIEW JOIN SHOP ON DREAM_REVIEW.SHOP_NO = SHOP.SHOP_NO ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT DREAM_REVIEW.*, "SHOP".SHOP_NAME FROM DREAM_REVIEW JOIN SHOP ON DREAM_REVIEW.SHOP_NO = SHOP.SHOP_NO WHERE DRMREVIEW_NO = #{drmRviewNo} ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT FROM DREAM_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo} AND DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM DREAM_REVIEW WHERE DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' AND SHOP_NO = #{ shopNo } UNION ALL SELECT MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, 'MZ' AS DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM MZ_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{ shopNo }) ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC) AS NUM, DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM (SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM DREAM_REVIEW WHERE DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' AND SHOP_NO = #{ shopNo } UNION ALL SELECT MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, 'MZ' AS DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM MZ_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{ shopNo })) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{ startNum } AND #{ endNum }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM DREAM_REVIEW WHERE DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' AND SHOP_NO = #{shopNo} UNION ALL SELECT MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO, 'MZ' AS DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN FROM MZ_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo}) ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT FROM DREAM_REVIEW WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo} AND DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN = 'Y')

SELECT SHOP_NO FROM(SELECT AMOUNT, SHOP_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC) AS RANK FROM(SELECT COUNT(*) AS AMOUNT, SHOP_NO FROM ( SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO FROM DREAM_REVIEW UNION ALL SELECT MZREVIEW_TITLE, MZREVIEW_CONTENT, MZREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, SHOP_NO FROM MZ_REVIEW) GROUP BY SHOP_NO)) WHERE RANK BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM DREAM_REVIEW ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DREAM_REVIEW VALUES(SEQ_DREAM_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{drmReviewTitle}, #{drmReviewContent}, #{drmReviewWriter}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{drmReviewPublicYN}, '1', #{userNo}, #{shopNo}, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE DREAM_REVIEW SET DRMREVIEW_TITLE=#{drmReviewTitle}, DRMREVIEW_CONTENT=#{drmReviewContent}, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE=SYSDATE, DRMREVIEW_PUBLIC_YN=#{drmReviewPublicYN} WHERE DRMREVIEW_NO = #{drmRviewNo}
UPDATE DREAM_REVIEW SET DRMREVIEW_HIT = DRMREVIEW_HIT + 1 WHERE DRMREVIEW_NO = #{drmRviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE DESC) AS NUM, DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_NO, SHOP_NAME, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, DREAM_REVIEW.USER_NO FROM DREAM_REVIEW JOIN SHOP USING (SHOP_NO) WHERE DREAM_REVIEW.USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DREAM_REVIEW WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT DRMREVIEW_TITLE, DRMREVIEW_NO, SHOP_NAME, DRMREVIEW_UPLOAD_DATE, DREAM_REVIEW.USER_NO FROM DREAM_REVIEW JOIN SHOP USING (SHOP_NO) WHERE DREAM_REVIEW.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY DRMREVIEW_CREATE_DATE DESC
